attributes.action: Require retailers etc to accept payment by cheque.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent disclosure that the credit card firm Egg is withdrawing cards from its most responsible customers, on the grounds that they have a "higher than acceptable risk profile", it is reasonable to assume that others will follow.   This follows decisions by major high street stores etc that they will no longer accept cheques as a method of payment.   These two measures will create major difficulties for many people.
